articles.content: Shakib Al Hasan scored 154 runs in three matches during the tri-series in New Zealand  •  Getty Images

articles.title: 'Tummies Visible' - Misbah-ul-Haq Slams Pakistan's Fitness Level - msnNOW
articles.description: Misbah ul Haq has blasted Pakistan's fitness standards and said that it is a joke, as per Times Now. Misbah was Pakistan's head coach until 2021 and said that no fitness tests were performed plus there's no benchmark to follow either.
